About the Game

WISHLIST OUR NEW GAME:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1957130/Night_of_Love/

Once upon a time there was a king and queen who lived in a castle with their beautiful daughter. One night an evil dragon captured the beautiful princess and locked her up in his tall, dark tower. The king and queen were very sad. They promised to give a bag of gold and a noble title to anyone who'll rescue the princess... bla bla bla, you know the story. But dragons have feelings too. Maybe its better to "fight" them in some more interesting ways?"

My Furry Dragon is a short visual novel about your relationship with a dragon.

Features:

data.short_description: Oh no, the kingdom is being terrorized and the princess is captured by an dragon. You, as a valiant knight, must travel across the kingdom to the dark castle, free the princess and punish the evil dragon. But is the dragon really that evil?
